message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $12000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $9500. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm really interested in this product, and I'm willing to go up to $10000. This is my final offer. What do you say?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering it to you for $10500. This is my final counteroffer. What do you think?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $10500 is still just a bit outside my budget. I'm truly interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $10000.  This is my final offer. If this doesn't work, I'll have to explore other options.
